message.content: cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. The paper deals with visual question answering and image captioning, which are tasks that require a combination of computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel approach that exploits the connection between language and vision, which involves generating captions to aid in answering visual questions. This approach involves using existing caption datasets, which suggests that the paper may also be relevant to the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Finally, the paper uses an online gradient-based method to automatically determine question-relevant captions, which suggests that it may also be relevant to the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
